Reviews.Title: Verizon HTC Droid Incredible 4G LTE
Reviews.Author: rhonda howard
Reviews.Content: I order the phone on March 26 and it was delivered to me on March 28.Verizon put my services on the phone with no problem.The phone was prefect no scratches look new.My phone was stolen from me on March 24.So Im very happy to have another phone just like it.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Came to the Right Place!
Reviews.Author: Naturist
Reviews.Content: Item is flawless.Lets me keep my old Verizon contract forever, month-to-month, including my Unlimited Data.This is the way to go!Screw New Every Two - Buy from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Droid Incredible
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: They don't call it the incredible for nothing... Best phone I've ever had... Does the same thing the Samsung galaxy and IPhone and MORE... very satisfied with product..

Reviews.Title: Like New
Reviews.Author: Michael Harrison
Reviews.Content: Phone was as advertised, "like new". The phone had no visible scratches, dents or dammage. Phone came with power cord, but no SIM card or the 8MB external SD card. Phone arrived within 48 hours, had phone activated same day with no problem. Verizon SIM card and activation was free.

Reviews.Title: Defective product
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Duffy
Reviews.Content: This product was shipped to me within 2 days, and was incredibly cheap, but the ear speaker does not work at all. I am now forced to make all my calls on speaker or use headphones.I can't complain too much because of the low price, but it was not delivered as listing described it.

Reviews.Title: pretty good phone for price
Reviews.Author: P Sundeen
Reviews.Content: bought this because my razr maxx died mid contact. product arrived as advertised. standard android slow downs... better battery life than i expected.

Reviews.Title: Incredible 4G or Incredible 4G lite?
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was looking for 4G Incredible droid the advertisement I read said it was a Incredible 4G. But when I received the phone it turned out to be an Incredible 4G lite. Was the add misleading? The phone works really well However the technician I talked to prior to the purchase said to not buy the Incredible 4G lite version of the droid. I would recommend this the Incredible 4G droid to anyone looking for a good phone!

Reviews.Title: Decent phone
Reviews.Author: William Bettes "WBettes"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone primarily because I did not want to have to renew my contract with Verizon and lose my unlimited data as well as the ability to jump ship if I so decided. In this sense, the phone is well worth the money. Though this phone came out at about the same time as the phone it replaced for me (a Motorola Droid RAZR), Android seems to have forgotten about it. It came with the version of Android known as Ice Cream Sandwich whereas my RAZR had Jellybean. It additionally had the HTC Sense overlay included, which I am not particularly a fan of--I prefer a close-to-stock Android experience. Once rooted and given a new ROM, though, it functions really well. Decent battery life. Note that this phone (as well as other HTC phones, as I understand) are not particularly easy to root-you can't use a one-click rooter to root this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for Verizon iPhone 4!
Reviews.Author: A. Morton
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 4 was out of contract with Verizon, and I did not want to sign another 2 year deal for a number of reasons, including the fact I was grandfathered in to the unlimited data plan. This phone fits all my needs, has 4G LTE which my iPhone 4 did not, is customizable in lots of cool ways, and will work on any network, including when I travel and change Sims! Maybe when the Nexus 5 come out I will upgrade, but I'll definitely keep this phone for a spare for the kids or when I travel. Very happy with the purchase. Should notE the vendor sent it without the 16gb card it originally came stock with, so he must have pulled it for his own use or resell, which h did mention in the item description but made setting up the phone a pain with only the onboard storage. I ordered a memory card and when that comes the phone will be perfect for my needs. If you can find one with the card it shipped with, you wont have the same out of the box storage problem so you might want to find one where the seller did nit take out the mSD card. Goodbye Apple, and good riddance!
